otherNames: 镇国神婿, Zhen Guo Godly Son-in-Law, 镇国神婿 动态漫画,Zhen Guo Shen Son-in-law,Dynamic comics of the son-in-law of Zhen Guo
synopsis: Chu Chen, the descendant of the world’s number one Qimen, accidentally sealed his own soul and five souls on the way down the mountain after finishing his studies, and became the son-in-law of a fool for five years. After awakening, a generation of domineering son-in-law Chu Chen drank the strongest wine, beat the worst dogs, and staged a life of counterattack every day!
